00023 namespace CALICE {
00024 
00025   AppendMultiAmplitude::AppendMultiAmplitude() :  marlin::Processor("AppendMultiAmplitude"),_connectionAvailable(false)  {
00026 
00027     _description = " This processor adds the analog multiplicity counter amplitude as " PAR_MULTI_AMPL " to the event";
00028 
00029     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT, "ADCCollectionName" ,
00030                              "The name of the adc collection (input) to be used" ,
00031                              _adcColName ,
00032                              std::string(COL_ADC) );
00033 
00034     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT, "connectionCollectionName" ,
00035                              "The name of the DAQconnection collection (input) to be used" ,
00036                              _connectionColName ,
00037                              std::string("VetoConnection") );
00038 
00039     registerInputCollection( LCIO::LCGENERICOBJECT, "MultiAmplitudeParameterName" ,
00040                              "The name of the event parameter (input) to be used" ,
00041                              _parNameMultiAmpl,
00042                              std::string(PAR_MULTI_AMPL) );
00043   }
00044 
00045 
00046   void AppendMultiAmplitude::conditionsChanged(lcio::LCCollection* col) {
00047     if (col->getNumberOfElements() != 1) {
00048       streamlog_out(WARNING1) << "unnatural connection collection size: " << col->getNumberOfElements() << std::endl;
00049     }
00050     for (unsigned int elm_i=0;elm_i< (unsigned int)col->getNumberOfElements() ; elm_i++) {
00051       DAQconnection connection(col->getElementAt(elm_i));
00052       _crate   = connection.getCrate();
00053       _slot    = connection.getSlot();
00054       _fe      = connection.getFe();
00055       _chip    = connection.getChip();
00056       _channel = connection.getChannel();
00057       _connectionAvailable = true;
00058       streamlog_out(MESSAGE) << "found veto connection info: " << _crate << "," << _slot << "," << _fe << "," << _chip << "," << _channel << std::endl;
00059     }
00060   }
00061 
00062 
00063   void AppendMultiAmplitude::init() {
00064 
00065     printParameters();
00066 
00067     marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( this,_connectionColName);
00068 
00069   }

00072   void AppendMultiAmplitude::processRunHeader( LCRunHeader* run) {
00073 
00074   }

00076 
00077   void AppendMultiAmplitude::processEvent( LCEvent * evt ) {
00078 
00079     if (!_connectionAvailable) {
00080       streamlog_out(WARNING1) << "No VETO connection information available, cannot process veto" << std::endl;
00081       return;
00082     }
00083 
00084     try {
00085       LCCollection* col_adc = evt->getCollection( _adcColName ) ;
00086 
00087       for (unsigned int elm_i=0;elm_i<(unsigned int)(col_adc->getNumberOfElements()); elm_i++) {
00088         AdcBlock adc_block(col_adc->getElementAt(elm_i));
00089 
00090         if ((unsigned int)(adc_block.getCrateID()) == _crate
00091             && (unsigned int)(adc_block.getSlotID()) == _slot
00092             && (unsigned int)(adc_block.getBoardFrontEnd()) == _fe
00093             && (unsigned int)(adc_block.getMultiplexPosition()) == _channel) {
00094           evt->parameters().setValue(_parNameMultiAmpl,(float)(adc_block.getAdcVal(_chip)));
00095 
00096           // there is only one veto counter
00097           break;
00098         }
00099       }
00100     }
00101     catch (  DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
00102     }
00103   }
00104

00106   void AppendMultiAmplitude::end()  {
00107   }
